thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk | 74 of 1012
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
The process was relatively easy but I was disappointed to see that the "Total" spend figure did not include the Delivery Charge (in smaller, fainter print), so it was not until I came to the final page to pay that the Delivery Charge was then applied.
Fortunately, before paying, I checked on line to see if there were any discount codes and fortunately found the free delivery discount code. Nonetheless, I think the website ought to show the real total cost including delivery charge before the payment page
